meanings.definition: A group of people working together.
meanings.sent1: The ganging of friends helped each other with the project.
meanings.sent2: The ganging of workers completed the task efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The ganging of classmates made studying more fun.
meanings.sent4: The ganging of ants carried the food back to their nest.
meanings.sent5: The ganging of birds flew in perfect formation.

meanings.definition: To join or form a group.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys ganging with her friends after school.
meanings.sent2: Let's gang together to solve this puzzle.
meanings.sent3: The kids decided to gang up for the scavenger hunt.
meanings.sent4: The clouds seemed to gang together before the storm.
meanings.sent5: We should gang to support our teammate in the game.

meanings.sent1: The ducks were ganging along the pond.
meanings.sent2: People were ganging towards the concert venue.
meanings.sent3: The toys ganged up and rolled down the hill.
meanings.sent4: The leaves ganged in the wind, swirling around.
meanings.sent5: The students ganging to the cafeteria for lunch.
